title: Game crashing during loading screen
body:
After champ select, when the loading screen is supposed to appear, all I get is a black screen that I'm unable to tab out of or force quit. I won't load into game and my only option is to restart my computer completely. This has been happening for a few days now and I've tried reinstalling League but no use. 
I'm also on a Mac, I've downloaded macOS Sierra but it worked fine the first day I had it.

replies.body: This sounds like a network issue that's failing to establish comms with the game server, which would result in black screens like this.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to troubleshoot this.  Make sure to select Mac for instructions specific to your OS.  Hopefully, that will get you back in game!
